title: A Touching Gift
itunes:title: A Touching Gift
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Beware a woman scorned...

***

Written by Erutious

***

Bonus episode: The Clean Scent of Tavistock, written by NM Brown and narrated by Nichole Goodnight

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
